[03] 95^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^tuṇhī ahosī^eb^ti sattūpaladdhiyaṃ ṭhatvā apucchaṃ pucchatīti tuṇhī ahosi. ^b^sabbasāmukkaṃsikaṃ vata me^eb^ti mayā sabbapucchānaṃ uttamapucchaṃ pucchito samaṇo gotamo saṃsādeti no vissajjeti, nūna na visahati na sakkoti vissajjetunti evaṃ pāpikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ mā paṭilabhīti. ^b^tadassā^eb^ti taṃ evaṃ uppannaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ bhaveyya. ^b^paccantima^eb^nti yasmā majjhimadese nagarassa uddhāpādīni thirāni vā hontu dubbalāni vā, sabbaso vā pana mā hontu, corāsaṅkā na hoti. tasmā taṃ aggahetvā ``paccantimaṃ nagara''nti āha. ^b^daḷhuddhāpa^eb^nti ^a^P5.0065^ea^ thirapākārapādaṃ. ^b^daḷhapākāratoraṇa^eb^nti thirapākārañceva thirapiṭṭhisaṅghāṭañca. ^b^ekadvāra^eb^nti kasmā āha? bahudvārasmiñhi nagare bahūhi paṇḍitadovārikehi bhavitabbaṃ, ekadvāre ekova vaṭṭati. tathāgatassa ca paññāya añño sadiso natthi. tasmā satthu paṇḍitabhāvassa opammatthaṃ ekaṃyeva dovārikaṃ dassetuṃ ``ekadvāra''nti āha. ^b^paṇḍito^eb^ti paṇḍiccena samannāgato. ^b^byatto^eb^ti veyyattiyena samannāgato. ^b^medhāvī^eb^ti ṭhānuppattiyapaññāsaṅkhātāya medhāya samannāgato. ^b^anupariyāyapatha^eb^nti anupariyāyanāmakaṃ maggaṃ. ^b^pākārasandhi^eb^nti dvinnaṃ iṭṭhakānaṃ apagataṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^pākāravivara^eb^nti pākārassa chinnaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^tadevetaṃ pañha^eb^nti taṃyeva ``sassato loko''tiādinā nayena puṭṭhaṃ ṭhapanīyapañhaṃ punapi pucchi. ^b^sabbo ca tena loko^eb^ti sattūpaladdhiyaṃyeva ṭhatvā aññenākārena pucchatīti dasseti.

[03] 96^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^pubbāpayamāno^eb^ti pubbasadisāni nirudakāni kurumāno. ^b^kvettha, āvuso^eb^ti ko ^a^V3.0329^ea^ ettha, āvuso. ^b^yāvatā, āvuso, diṭṭhī^eb^ti ^a^M3.0332^ea^ yattikā dvāsaṭṭhividhāpi diṭṭhi nāma atthi. ^b^yāvatā diṭṭhiṭṭhāna^eb^nti ``khandhāpi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ, avijjāpi, phassopi, saññāpi, vitakkopi ayonisomanasikāropi, pāpamittopi ^a^P5.0066^ea^, paratoghosopi diṭṭhiṭṭhāna''nti evaṃ yattakaṃ aṭṭhavidhampi diṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ diṭṭhikāraṇaṃ nāma atthi. ^b^diṭṭhādhiṭṭhāna^eb^nti diṭṭhīnaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṃ, adhiṭhatvā adhibhavitvā pavattāya diṭṭhiyā etaṃ nāmaṃ. ^b^diṭṭhipariyuṭṭhāna^eb^nti ``katamāni aṭṭhārasa diṭṭhipariyuṭṭhānāni? yā diṭṭhi diṭṭhigataṃ diṭṭhigahanaṃ diṭṭhikantāraṃ diṭṭhivisūkaṃ diṭṭhivipphanditaṃ diṭṭhisaṃyojanaṃ diṭṭhisallaṃ diṭṭhisambādho diṭṭhipalibodho diṭṭhibandhanaṃ diṭṭhipapāto diṭṭhānusayo diṭṭhisantāpo diṭṭhipariḷāho diṭṭhigantho diṭṭhupādānaṃ diṭṭhābhiniveso diṭṭhiparāmāso. imāni aṭṭhārasa diṭṭhipariyuṭṭhānānī''ti evaṃ vuttaṃ diṭṭhipariyuṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^samuṭṭhāna^eb^nti diṭṭhiṭṭhānasseva vevacanaṃ. vuttañhetaṃ -- ``khandhā paccayo diṭṭhīnaṃ upādāya samuṭṭhānaṭṭhenā''ti (paṭi0 ma0 1.124) sabbaṃ vitthāretabbaṃ. sotāpattimaggo pana ^b^diṭṭhisamugghāto^eb^ nāma sabbadiṭṭhīnaṃ samugghātakattā. ^b^tamaha^eb^nti taṃ sabbaṃ ahaṃ jānāmi. ^b^kyāhaṃ vakkhāmī^eb^ti kiṃkāraṇā ahaṃ vakkhāmi.
[03] 97-98^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^sammādiṭṭhiko^eb^ti yāthāvadiṭṭhiko. aṭṭhame ^b^adhikaraṇasamuppādavūpasamakusalo^eb^ti catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ mūlaṃ gahetvā vūpasamena samuppādavūpasamakusalo hoti.

[03] 99^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^P5.0067^ea^ ^b^durabhisambhavānī^eb^ti sambhavituṃ dukkhāni dussahāni, na sakkā appesakkhehi ajjhogāhitunti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^araññavanapatthānī^eb^ti araññāni ca vanapatthāni ca. āraññakaṅganipphādanena araññāni, gāmantaṃ atikkamitvā manussānaṃ anupacāraṭṭhānabhāvena vanapatthāni. ^b^pantānī^eb^ti pariyantāni atidūrāni. ^b^dukkaraṃ paviveka^eb^nti kāyaviveko dukkaro. ^b^durabhirama^eb^nti abhiramituṃ na sukaraṃ. ^b^ekatte^eb^ti ekībhāve. kiṃ dasseti? kāyaviveke katepi tattha cittaṃ abhiramāpetuṃ dukkaraṃ. dvayaṃdvayārāmo hi ayaṃ lokoti. ^b^haranti maññe^eb^ti haranti viya ghasanti viya. ^b^mano^eb^ti cittaṃ. ^b^samādhiṃ alabhamānassā^eb^ti upacārasamādhiṃ vā appanāsamādhiṃ vā alabhantassa ^a^M3.0333^ea^. kiṃ dasseti? īdisassa bhikkhuno ^a^V3.0330^ea^ tiṇapaṇṇamigādisaddehi vividhehi ca bhīsanakehi vanāni cittaṃ vikkhipanti maññeti. ^b^saṃsīdissatī^eb^ti kāmavitakkena saṃsīdissati. ^b^uplavissatī^eb^ti byāpādavihiṃsāvitakkehi uddhaṃ plavissati.

[03] ^b^kaṇṇasaṃdhovika^eb^nti kaṇṇe dhovantena kīḷitabbaṃ. ^b^piṭṭhisaṃdhovika^eb^nti piṭṭhiṃ dhovantena kīḷitabbaṃ. tattha ^a^P5.0068^ea^ udakaṃ soṇḍāya gahetvā dvīsu kaṇṇesu āsiñcanaṃ kaṇṇasaṃdhovikā nāma, piṭṭhiyaṃ āsiñcanaṃ piṭṭhisaṃdhovikā nāma. ^b^gādhaṃ vindatī^eb^ti patiṭṭhaṃ labhati. ^b^ko cāhaṃ ko ca hatthināgo^eb^ti ahaṃ ko, hatthināgo ko, ahampi tiracchānagato, ayampi, mayhampi cattāro pādā, imassapi, nanu ubhopi mayaṃ samasamāti.

[03] ^b^vaṅkaka^eb^nti kumārakānaṃ kīḷanakaṃ khuddakanaṅgalaṃ. ^b^ghaṭika^eb^nti dīghadaṇḍakena rassadaṇḍakaṃ paharaṇakīḷaṃ. ^b^mokkhacika^eb^nti saṃparivattakakīḷaṃ, ākāse daṇḍakaṃ gahetvā bhūmiyaṃ vā sīsaṃ ṭhapetvā heṭṭhupariyabhāvena parivattanakīḷanti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^ciṅgulaka^eb^nti tālapaṇṇādīhi kataṃ vātappahārena paribbhamanacakkaṃ. ^b^pattāḷhakaṃ^eb^ vuccati paṇṇanāḷi, tāya vālukādīni minantā kīḷanti. ^b^rathaka^eb^nti khuddakarathaṃ. ^b^dhanuka^eb^nti khuddakadhanumeva.

[03] ^b^idha kho pana vo^eb^ti ettha ^b^vo^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ, idha kho panāti attho. ^b^iṅgha tvaṃ, upāli, saṅghe viharāhī^eb^ti ettha ^b^iṅghā^eb^ti codanatthe nipāto. tena theraṃ saṅghamajjhe vihāratthāya codeti, nāssa araññavāsaṃ anujānāti. kasmā? araññasenāsane ^a^P5.0069^ea^ vasato kirassa vāsadhurameva pūrissati, na ganthadhuraṃ. saṅghamajjhe vasanto pana dve dhurāni pūretvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇissati, vinayapiṭake ca pāmokkho bhavissati. athassāhaṃ parisamajjhe pubbapatthanaṃ pubbābhinīhārañca kathetvā imaṃ bhikkhuṃ vinayadharānaṃ aggaṭṭhāne ṭhapessāmīti imamatthaṃ passamāno satthā therassa araññavāsaṃ nānujānīti. dasamaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
[06] upālivaggo pañcamo.
[06] dutiyapaṇṇāsakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.

[03] 101^b^.^eb^ tatiyassa ^a^M3.0334^ea^ ^a^V3.0331^ea^ paṭhame ^b^samaṇasaññā^eb^ti samaṇānaṃ uppajjanakasaññā. ^b^santatakārī^eb^ti nirantarakārī. ^b^abyāpajjho^eb^ti niddukkho. ^b^idamatthaṃtissa hotī^eb^ti idamatthaṃ ime paccayāti evamassa jīvitaparikkhāresu hoti, paccavekkhitaparibhogaṃ paribhuñjatīti attho. dutiyaṃ uttānatthameva.
[03] 103^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^virādhanā hotī^eb^ti saggato maggato ca virajjhanaṃ hoti. ^b^no ārādhanā^eb^ti na sampādanā na paripūrakāritā hoti. ^b^pahotī^eb^ti pavattati.

[03] 104-105^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^yathādiṭṭhi samattaṃ samādinna^eb^nti diṭṭhānurūpena paripuṇṇaṃ samādinnaṃ sakalaṃ gahitaṃ. ^b^cetanā^eb^ti tīsu dvāresu nibbattitacetanāva gahitā. ^b^patthanā^eb^ti ``evarūpo siya''nti evaṃ patthanā. ^b^paṇidhī^eb^ti ^a^P5.0070^ea^ ``devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā''ti cittaṭṭhapanā. ^b^saṅkhārā^eb^ti sampayuttakasaṅkhārā. pañcame purecārikaṭṭhena ^b^pubbaṅgamā. anvadevā^eb^ti taṃ anubandhamānameva.

[03] 106^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^V3.0332^ea^ ^b^nijjaravatthūnī^eb^ti nijjarakāraṇāni. ^b^micchādiṭṭhi nijjiṇṇā hotī^eb^ti ayaṃ heṭṭhā vipassanāyapi nijjiṇṇā eva pahīnā. kasmā puna gahitāti? asamucchinnattā. vipassanāya hi kiñcāpi nijjiṇṇā, na pana samucchinnā. maggo pana uppajjitvā taṃ samucchindati, na puna vuṭṭhātuṃ deti. tasmā puna gahitā. evaṃ sabbapadesu yojetabbo. ettha ca sammāvimuttipaccayā catusaṭṭhi dhammā bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchanti. katame catusaṭṭhi? sotāpattimaggakkhaṇe adhimokkhaṭṭhena ^a^M3.0335^ea^ saddhindriyaṃ paripūrati, paggahaṭṭhena vīriyindriyaṃ, upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena satindriyaṃ, avikkhepaṭṭhena samādhindriyaṃ, dassanaṭṭhena paññindriyaṃ paripūreti, vijānanaṭṭhena manindriyaṃ, abhinandanaṭṭhena somanassindriyaṃ, pavattasantatiādhipateyyaṭṭhena jīvitindriyaṃ paripūrati...pe0... arahattaphalakkhaṇe adhimokkhaṭṭhena saddhindriyaṃ...pe0... pavattasantatiādhipateyyaṭṭhena jīvitindriyaṃ paripūratīti evaṃ catūsu ca maggesu catūsu ca phalesu aṭṭhaṭṭha hutvā catusaṭṭhi dhammā pāripūriṃ gacchanti.

[03] 107^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^P5.0071^ea^ ^b^dhovana^eb^nti aṭṭhidhovanaṃ. tasmiñhi janapade manussā ñātake mate na jhāpenti, āvāṭaṃ pana khaṇitvā bhūmiyaṃ nidahanti. atha nesaṃ pūtibhūtānaṃ aṭṭhīni nīharitvā dhovitvā paṭipāṭiyā ussāpetvā gandhamālehi pūjetvā ṭhapenti. nakkhatte patte tāni aṭṭhīni gahetvā rodanti paridevanti, tato nakkhattaṃ kīḷanti.

[03] 108-110^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^virecana^eb^nti dosanīharaṇabhesajjaṃ. ^b^virittā hotī^eb^ti nīhaṭā hoti panuditā. navame ^b^vamana^eb^nti vamanakaraṇabhesajjaṃ. dasame ^b^niddhamanīyā^eb^ti niddhamitabbā. ^b^niddhantā^eb^ti niddhamitā.

[03] 111^b^.^eb^ ekādasame ^a^V3.0333^ea^ aṅgaparipūraṇatthaṃ sammādiṭṭhiyeva ^b^sammāñāṇa^eb^nti vuttā. evamete sabbepi arahattaphaladhammā asekhā, asekhassa pavattattā paccavekkhaṇañāṇampi asekhanti vuttaṃ.
[03] 112^b^.^eb^ dvādasame ^b^asekhiyā^eb^ti asekhāyeva, asekhasantakā vā. iminā suttena khīṇāsavova kathitoti.
[06] samaṇasaññāvaggo paṭhamo.
[03] 113-114^b^.^eb^ dutiyassa ^a^M3.0336^ea^ paṭhame pāṭiyekkaṃ pucchā ca vissajjanā ca katā. dutiye ekatova.

[03] 115^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^uddesaṃ uddisitvā^eb^ti mātikaṃ nikkhipitvā. ^b^satthu^eb^ ^a^P5.0072^ea^ ^b^ceva saṃvaṇṇito^eb^ti pañcasu ṭhānesu etadagge ṭhapentena satthārā saṃvaṇṇito. ^b^sambhāvito^eb^ti guṇasambhāvanāya sambhāvito. ^b^pahotī^eb^ti sakkoti. ^b^atisitvā^eb^ti atikkamitvā. ^b^jānaṃ jānātī^eb^ti jānitabbakaṃ ^a^V3.0334^ea^ jānāti. ^b^passaṃ passatī^eb^ti passitabbakaṃ passati. ^b^cakkhubhūto^eb^ti cakkhu viya bhūto jāto nibbatto. ^b^ñāṇabhūto^eb^ti ñāṇasabhāvo. ^b^dhammabhūto^eb^ti dhammasabhāvo. ^b^brahmabhūto^eb^ti seṭṭhasabhāvo. ^b^vattā^eb^ti vattuṃ samattho. ^b^pavattā^eb^ti pavattetuṃ samattho. ^b^atthassa ninnetā^eb^ti atthaṃ nīharitvā dassetā. ^b^yathā no bhagavā^eb^ti yathā amhākaṃ bhagavā byākareyya.

[03] 116^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^ajito^eb^ti evaṃnāmako. ^b^cittaṭṭhānasatānī^eb^ti cittuppādasatāni. ^b^yehī^eb^ti yehi cittaṭṭhānasatehi anuyuñjiyamānā. ^b^upāraddhāva jānanti upāraddhasmā^eb^ti viraddhā niggahitā evaṃ jānanti ``viraddhā mayaṃ, niggahitā mayaṃ, āropito no doso''ti. ^b^paṇḍitavatthūnī^eb^ti paṇḍitabhāvatthāya kāraṇāni.

[03] 117-118^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^orimaṃ tīra^eb^nti lokiyaṃ orimatīraṃ. ^b^pārimaṃ tīra^eb^nti lokuttaraṃ pārimatīraṃ. ^b^pāragāmino^eb^ti nibbānagāmino. ^b^tīramevānudhāvatī^eb^ti sakkāyadiṭṭhitīraṃyeva anudhāvati. ^b^dhamme^eb^ ^a^P5.0073^ea^ ^b^dhammānuvattino^eb^ti sammā akkhāte navavidhe lokuttaradhamme anudhammavattino, tassa dhammassānucchavikāya sahasīlāya pubbabhāgapaṭipattiyā pavattamānā. ^b^maccudheyyaṃ^eb^ ^a^M3.0337^ea^ ^b^suduttara^eb^nti maccuno ṭhānabhūtaṃ tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ suduttaraṃ taritvā. ^b^pāramessantī^eb^ti nibbānaṃ pāpuṇissanti.

[03] ^b^okā anokamāgammā^eb^ti vaṭṭato vivaṭṭaṃ āgamma. ^b^viveke yattha dūrama^eb^nti yasmiṃ kāyacittaupadhiviveke durabhiramaṃ, tatrābhiratimiccheyya. ^b^hitvā kāme^eb^ti duvidhepi kāme pahāya. ^b^akiñcano^eb^ti nippalibodho. ^b^ādānapaṭinissage^eb^ti gahaṇapaṭinissaggasaṅkhāte nibbāne. ^b^anupādāya ye ratā^eb^ti catūhi upādānehi kiñcipi anupādiyitvā ye abhiratā. ^b^parinibbutā^eb^ti te apaccayaparinibbānena parinibbutā nāmāti veditabbā. chaṭṭhaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ desitaṃ.

[03] 119-120^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^V3.0335^ea^ ^b^paccorohaṇī^eb^ti pāpassa paccorohaṇaṃ. ^b^pattharitvā^eb^ti santharitvā. ^b^antarā ca velaṃ antarā ca agyāgāra^eb^nti vālikārāsissa ca aggiagārassa ca antare. aṭṭhamaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa desitaṃ. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
[06] paccorohaṇivaggo dutiyo.
[03] 123^b^.^eb^ tatiyassa ^a^P5.0074^ea^ paṭhame ^b^parisuddhā^eb^ti nimmalā. ^b^pariyodātā^eb^ti pabhassarā. dutiyādīni uttānatthānevāti.
[06] parisuddhavaggo tatiyo.
[03] 134^b^.^eb^ catutthassa paṭhame ^b^sādhu^eb^nti bhaddakaṃ siliṭṭhakaṃ. dutiyādīni uttānatthānevāti. ariyamaggavaggo uttānatthoyevāti.
[06] sādhuvaggo catuttho.
[06] tatiyapaṇṇāsakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
[03] 155^b^.^eb^ catutthassa ^a^V3.0336^ea^ ^a^M3.0338^ea^ paṭhamādīni uttānatthānevāti.

[03] 175^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^parikkamanaṃ hotī^eb^ti parivajjanaṃ hoti.

[03] 176^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^kammāraputtassā^eb^ti suvaṇṇakāraputtassa. ^b^kassa no tva^eb^nti kassa nu tvaṃ. ^b^pacchābhūmakā^eb^ti pacchābhūmivāsikā. ^b^kamaṇḍalukā^eb^ti kamaṇḍaludhārino. ^b^sevālamālikā^eb^ti sevālamālā viya dhārenti. sevālapaṭanivāsitātipi vuttameva. ^b^udakorohakā^eb^ti sāyatatiyakaṃ udakorohanānuyogamanuyuttā. ^b^āmaseyyāsī^eb^ti hatthena parimajjeyyāsi.

[03] 177^b^.^eb^ ekādasame ^b^upakappatū^eb^ti pāpuṇātu. ^b^ṭhāne^eb^ti okāse. ^b^no aṭṭhāne^eb^ti no anokāse. ^b^nerayikānaṃ^eb^ ^a^P5.0075^ea^ ^b^āhāro^eb^ nāma tattha nibbattanakammameva. teneva hi te tattha yāpenti. ^b^tiracchānayonikānaṃ^eb^ pana tiṇapaṇṇādivasena āhāro veditabbo. ^b^manussānaṃ^eb^ odanakummāsādivasena ^a^V3.0337^ea^, ^b^devānaṃ^eb^ sudhābhojanādivasena, ^b^pettivesayikānaṃ^eb^ kheḷasiṅghāṇikādivasena. ^b^yaṃ vā panassa ito anuppavecchantī^eb^ti yaṃ tassa mittādayo ito dadantā anupavesenti. pettivesayikā eva hi paradattūpajīvino honti, na aññesaṃ parehi dinnaṃ ^a^M3.0339^ea^ upakappati. ^b^dāyakopi anipphalo^eb^ti yaṃ sandhāya taṃ dānaṃ dinnaṃ, tassa upakappatu vā mā vā, dāyakena pana na sakkā nipphalena bhavituṃ, dāyako tassa dānassa vipākaṃ labhatiyeva.

[03] ^b^aṭṭhānepi bhavaṃ gotamo parikappaṃ vadatī^eb^ti anokāse uppannepi tasmiṃ ñātake bhavaṃ gotamo dānassa phalaṃ parikappetiyeva paññāpetiyevāti pucchati. brāhmaṇassa hi ``evaṃ dinnassa dānassa phalaṃ dāyako na labhatī''ti laddhi. athassa bhagavā pañhaṃ paṭijānitvā ``dāyako nāma yattha katthaci puññaphalūpajīviṭṭhāne nibbatto dānassa phalaṃ labhatiyevā''ti dassetuṃ ^b^idha brāhmaṇā^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^so tattha lābhī hotī^eb^ti so tattha hatthiyoniyaṃ nibbattopi maṅgalahatthiṭṭhānaṃ patvā lābhī hoti. assādīsupi eseva nayo. sādhuvaggo uttānatthoyevāti.

[03] 216^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^saṃsappanīyapariyāyaṃ vo, bhikkhave, dhammapariyāya^eb^nti saṃsappanassa kāraṇaṃ desanāsaṅkhātaṃ dhammadesanaṃ. ^b^saṃsappatī^eb^ti taṃ kammaṃ karonto āsappati parisappati vipphandati. ^b^jimhā^eb^ ^a^P5.0076^ea^ ^b^gatī^eb^ti tena kammena yaṃ gatiṃ gamissati, sā jimhā hoti. ^b^jimhupapattī^eb^ti tassa yaṃ ^a^V3.0338^ea^ gatiṃ upapajjissati, sāpi jimhāva hoti. ^b^saṃsappajātikā^eb^ti saṃsappanasabhāvā. ^b^bhūtā bhūtassa upapatti hotī^eb^ti bhūtasmā sabhāvato vijjamānakammā sattassa nibbatti hoti. ^b^phassā phusantī^eb^ti vipākaphassā phusanti.

[03] 217-218^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^sañcetanikāna^eb^nti cetetvā pakappetvā katānaṃ. ^b^upacitāna^eb^nti citānaṃ vaḍḍhitānaṃ. ^b^appaṭisaṃveditvā^eb^ti tesaṃ kammānaṃ vipākaṃ avediyitvā. ^b^byantībhāva^eb^nti vigatantabhāvaṃ tesaṃ kammānaṃ paricchedaparivaṭumatākaraṇaṃ. ^b^tañca kho diṭṭheva dhamme^eb^ti tañca kho vipākaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme. ^b^upapajja^eb^nti upapajjavedanīyaṃ anantare attabhāve. ^b^apare vā pariyāye^eb^ti aparapariyāyavedanīyaṃ pana saṃsārappavatte sati sahassimepi attabhāveti. iminā idaṃ dasseti ``saṃsārappavatte paṭiladdhavipākārahakamme na vijjati so jagatippadeso, yattha ṭhito mucceyya pāpakammā''ti. ^b^tividhā^eb^ti ^a^P5.0077^ea^ tippakārā. ^b^kāyakammantasandosabyāpattī^eb^ti kāyakammantasaṅkhātā vipatti. iminā nayena sabbapadāni veditabbāni. aṭṭhame ^b^apaṇṇako maṇī^eb^ti samantato caturasso pāsako.

[03] 219^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^dukkhassā^eb^ti vipākadukkhassa, vaṭṭadukkhasseva vā. imasmiṃ sutte maṇiopammaṃ natthi. ^b^evaṃ vigatābhijjho^eb^ti ^b^eva^eb^nti nipātamattaṃ. yathā vā mettaṃ ^a^M3.0341^ea^ bhāventā vigatābhijjhā bhavanti, evaṃ vigatābhijjho. evamassa vigatābhijjhatādīhi nīvaraṇavikkhambhanaṃ dassetvā idāni akusalanissaraṇāni kathento ^b^mettāsahagatenā^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^appamāṇa^eb^nti appamāṇasattārammaṇatāya ciṇṇavasitāya vā appamāṇaṃ. ^b^pamāṇakataṃ kammaṃ^eb^ nāma kāmāvacarakammaṃ. ^b^na taṃ tatrāvatiṭṭhatī^eb^ti taṃ mahogho parittaṃ udakaṃ viya attano okāsaṃ gahetvā ṭhātuṃ na sakkoti, atha kho naṃ oghe parittaṃ udakaṃ viya idameva appamāṇaṃ kammaṃ ajjhottharitvā attano vipākaṃ nibbatteti. ^b^daharatagge^eb^ti daharakālato paṭṭhāya.

[03] ^b^nāyaṃ kāyo ādāyagamaniyo^eb^ti imaṃ kāyaṃ gahetvā paralokaṃ gantuṃ nāma na sakkāti attho ^a^V3.0339^ea^. ^b^cittantaro^eb^ti cittakāraṇo, atha vā citteneva antariko. ekasseva hi cuticittassa anantarā dutiye paṭisandhicitte devo nāma hoti, nerayiko nāma ^a^P5.0078^ea^ hoti, tiracchānagato nāma hoti. purimanayepi cittena kāraṇabhūtena devo nerayiko vā hotīti attho. ^b^sabbaṃ taṃ idha vedanīya^eb^nti diṭṭhadhammavedanīyakoṭṭhāsavanetaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^na taṃ anugaṃ bhavissatī^eb^ti mettāya upapajjavedanīyabhāvassa upacchinnattā upapajjavedanīyavasena na anugataṃ bhavissati. idaṃ sotāpannasakadāgāmiariyapuggalānaṃ paccavekkhaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. ^b^anāgāmitāyā^eb^ti jhānānāgāmitāya. ^b^idhapaññassā^eb^ti imasmiṃ sāsane paññā idhapaññā nāma, sāsanacaritāya ariyapaññāya ṭhitassa ariyasāvakassāti attho. ^b^uttarivimutti^eb^nti arahattaṃ. dasamaṃ uttānatthamevāti.
